docs.title: IFC Processing API
docs.text: FastAPI for processing IFC (Industry Foundation Classes) using IfcOpenShell.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• 🔍 IFC file processing with IfcOpenShell
  • 📊 Extract building element properties and quantities
  • 🏢 Split IFC files by storey
  • 📏 Automatic unit conversion
  • 🏗️ Building element information including:
  • Geometry (volume, area, dimensions)
  • Materials and their volumes
  • Properties (loadBearing, isExternal)
  • Building storey assignment

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
1. Install the package:
pip install -r requirements.txt
  1. Set up your API key in .env:
API_KEY=your-api-key-here
  1. Start the server:
python run.py

For more detailed information, check out:

  • API Reference for endpoint documentation
  • Contributing Guide for development setup
  • Security for data privacy information

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text: This document provides detailed information about the available API endpoints and their usage.

docs.title: Process IFC File
docs.text:
POST /api/ifc/process

Process an IFC file and stream the results. The response is streamed as newline-delimited JSON (NDJSON).

Request

  • Content-Type: multipart/form-data
  • Body:
  • file: IFC file (required)

Response

  • Status: 200 OK
  • Content-Type: application/x-ndjson

Progress updates during processing:

{
  "status": "processing",
  "progress": 45.5,
  "processed": 455,
  "total": 1000
}

Final response:

{
  "status": "complete",
  "elements": [
    {
      "id": "2O2Fr$t4X7Zf8NOew3FNr2",
      "type": "IFCWALL",
      "properties": {
        "name": "Basic Wall:Interior - 165 Partition (92mm Stud):261516",
        "level": "Level 1"
      },
      "volume": 12.5,
      "area": 25.0,
      "dimensions": {
        "length": 5.0,
        "width": 0.2,
        "height": 3.0
      },
      "materials": ["Concrete", "Steel"],
      "material_volumes": {
        "Concrete": {
          "volume": 10.5,
          "fraction": 0.84
        },
        "Steel": {
          "volume": 2.0,
          "fraction": 0.16
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}

docs.title: Split IFC by Storey
docs.text:
POST /api/ifc/split-by-storey

Split an IFC file by building storey and return the results as a zip file.

Request

  • Content-Type: multipart/form-data
  • Body:
  • file: IFC file (required)

Response

  • Status: 200 OK
  • Content-Type: application/zip
  • Body: ZIP file containing the split IFC files

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All API endpoints require authentication using an API key. Include the key in the request headers:

X-API-Key: your-api-key-here

Requests without a valid API key will receive a 401 Unauthorized response.

Note: The API documentation at /docs is publicly accessible, but you'll need to provide an API key to test the endpoints.

docs.title: Data Handling
docs.text:
We take data privacy seriously:

  • 🗑️ All uploaded files are automatically deleted after processing is complete
  • 🧹 Temporary files are completely wiped from container storage every hour
  • 🔒 Files are processed with minimal disk persistence
  • 📝 Processing logs are kept only for debugging and are regularly purged
  • 🔐 All API requests require authentication via API key
